statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_name, marker_type FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, marker_position FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY marker_name DESC;
SELECT marker_name, marker_type FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_position > 100;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_position > 100 ORDER BY marker_name DESC
SELECT marker_name, marker_position FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_type = 'SNP'
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, marker_position FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_type = 'STR' AND marker_position BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY marker_id ASC
SELECT marker_name, marker_type FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_position < 50 OR marker_position > 150
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY marker_position DESC, marker_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers;
SELECT marker_name, marker_position FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY marker_position DESC;
SELECT marker_name, marker_type FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE marker_position > 100;
SELECT * FROM StemCellDifferentiation WHERE differentiation_potential = 'Pluripotent';
SELECT cell_name, marker_name FROM StemCellDifferentiation INNER JOIN GeneticMarkers ON StemCellDifferentiation.marker_id = GeneticMarkers.marker_id;
SELECT marker_name, marker_type FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE marker_position > 100 ORDER BY marker_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM StemCellDifferentiation WHERE differentiation_potential = 'Pluripotent' AND marker_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT marker_type FROM GeneticMarkers;
SELECT cell_name, differentiation_potential FROM StemCellDifferentiation WHERE marker_id IN (SELECT marker_id FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE marker_type = 'SNP');
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers JOIN StemCellDifferentiation ON GeneticMarkers.marker_id = StemCellDifferentiation.marker_id ORDER BY cell_name ASC, marker_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_name, marker_type, chromosome_number FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome_number < 10;
SELECT donor_age, donor_gender FROM stem_cells WHERE donor_gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, cell_type, donor_age FROM stem_cells ORDER BY donor_age DESC;
SELECT marker_name, gene_name FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY marker_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome_number = 1;
SELECT marker_name, marker_type FROM genetic_markers WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome_number FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_type = 'SNP';
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_number, marker_type FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome_number IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT marker_name, marker_type, gene_name FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_type LIKE 'STR%';
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY marker_name DESC;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, chromosome_number FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE chromosome_number = 5;
SELECT * FROM StemCells WHERE gene_expression = 'high';
SELECT donor_name, donor_age FROM CellDonors ORDER BY donor_age ASC;
SELECT m.marker_name, e.expression_level FROM GeneticMarkers m JOIN MarkerExpression e ON m.marker_id = e.marker_id;
SELECT * FROM MarkerExpression WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT MarkerExpression.marker_id, GeneticMarkers.marker_name, MarkerExpression.expression_level FROM MarkerExpression JOIN GeneticMarkers ON MarkerExpression.marker_id = GeneticMarkers.marker_id;
SELECT StemCells.*, CellDonors.donor_name FROM StemCells INNER JOIN CellDonors ON StemCells.donor_id = CellDonors.donor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT GeneticMarkers.chromosome_number, COUNT(*) as marker_count FROM GeneticMarkers GROUP BY GeneticMarkers.chromosome_number;

SELECT MarkerExpression.marker_id, GeneticMarkers.marker_name, CellDonors.donor_name FROM MarkerExpression INNER JOIN GeneticMarkers ON MarkerExpression.marker_id = GeneticMarkers.marker_id INNER JOIN StemCells ON MarkerExpression.cell_id = StemCells.cell_id INNER JOIN CellDonors ON StemCells.donor_id = CellDonors.donor_id ORDER BY MarkerExpression.expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Genetic_Markers;
SELECT gene_name, marker_type FROM Genetic_Markers ORDER BY marker_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT chromosomal_location FROM Genetic_Markers;
SELECT * FROM Stem_Cell_Differentiation WHERE differentiation_stage='Early';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, institution FROM Research_Teams ORDER BY team_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genetic_Markers ORDER BY gene_name DESC, marker_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM Genetic_Markers WHERE chromosomal_location LIKE 'chr%' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, institution, field_of_study FROM Research_Teams WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT member_name, role FROM Team_Members JOIN Research_Teams ON Team_Members.team_id = Research_Teams.team_id WHERE field_of_study = 'Biology';

SELECT marker_id, gene_name, differentiation_stage FROM Genetic_Markers JOIN Stem_Cell_Differentiation ON Genetic_Markers.marker_id = Stem_Cell_Differentiation.marker_id WHERE differentiation_stage = 'Early' ORDER BY marker_id DESC, gene_name ASC;
